Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that California governor Jerry Brown is moving a veterans cemetery from San Francisco to Modesto to make way for low-income housing. This is not true.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Governor Brown has announced no plans or intentions to relocate any veterans remains or cemetery in California to make way for low-income housing.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or factual basis to support the statement that the veterans cemetery is being moved for low-income housing.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the cemetery is being relocated for the purpose of low-income housing without any evidence or proof.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the expert that the claim is a fabrication from a network of fake news sites dedicated to spreading political misinformation under the guise of satire.
